title: Yasuo Missing from custom bot game
body: I can't find Yasuo as a bot option in custom games. He isn't in between xin or ziggs which is where he should be since the option is in alphabetical order. Am I crazy wtf!!!

replies.body:
not every champion can be a bot
the champs you see there are the only ones available
This is correct - only the champions in the list have bot AI.

I'm a bit confused though. I'm sure I've seen a sona bot in AI games, but sona isn't on the list in customs. There are probably others but sona is the only one I can think of. Is there a reason for this or was she just never added to the list :P
You're correct, there used to be one. IIRC, she was removed from the list when her kit rework/update went out, because the logic needs to be reconfigured.
Will Katarina be added to the AI bot list? I want to learn to counter her.
Are we ever getting this champs as custom bots?
custom has nothing new there is even a yasuo bot in advanced ai vs coop
I wanted to learn to counter Mordekaiser but he's not on the list either
